name: Painted Rocks
description: You've got rocks, you've got paint, why not put them together?

name: Build Your Own Board Game
description: Do you ever get tired of playing the same games over and over? Why not make your own! You could start totally from scratch, or modify a family favorite. Check out these ideas on how to get started making your own game!
alt: An assortment of materials needed to design and create a board game, including tablet, game pieces and paper

name: Paint A Flower Pot
description: A fun and easy craft to turn those boring old terracotta pots into unique works of art. This step by step guide details everything you need to make your garden pop!
alt: Two terracotta flower pots that have been painted bright colors and stenciled phrases, let it grow and don't stop be-leaf-ing

name: Origami
description: Origami is a fun and inexpensive activity to do with your kiddos, or just yourself. This site has loads of different patterns with detailed instructions. See what you can create!
alt: A person's hands folding several different Origami animals in brightly colored papers
